body:
So the seller was Happosai?, I can't believe he would let that manipulation item go no matter the amount of money, he would prefer to have Ranma for himself he desired to fuck that female body more than anything else.
I can see Nabiki selling the item she was the money driven one.
Well,since her/his body change then its not a trap,you can jerk off in peace

The thing is, I wish Ranma-chan (the female Ranma) could have been a seperated character from the male Ranma at the end of Ranma 1/2, I mean Ranma-chan is cute but I always remind myself that she is no one but the male Ranma himself.
